status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.description:
*Steps to reproduce*
run
{{ti info -t android}}

{code}
Android Emulators
  None
{code}

But if run
{{android list}}

{code}
Available Android Virtual Devices:
    Name: Phone41
  Device: Nexus 4 (Google)
    Path: /home/sergii/.android/avd/Phone41.avd
  Target: Android 4.1.2 (API level 16)
 Tag/ABI: default/x86
    Skin: HVGA
  Sdcard: 5G
---------
    Name: Phonegap
  Device: Nexus 4 (Google)
    Path: /home/sergii/.android/avd/Phonegap.avd
  Target: Android 4.4.2 (API level 19)
 Tag/ABI: default/x86
    Skin: HVGA
  Sdcard: 5G
{code}
fields.summary: Titanium CLI: Android Emulators: empty list
fields.environment:
Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit)
Titanium CLI 3.4.0
Android SDK Manager 23.0.2
NodeJS v0.10.25

comments.body: Sorry it fixed now. Maybe it was just needed to restart my laptop
